XenotypeDef.label: vulpes
XenotypeDef.description:
Vulpes are a xenotype that looks like an anthropomorphic fox. They were created as domestic servants in a utopian world, but managed to escape and are now dispersed throughout many worlds.

They are weak physically, but beautiful and not bad negotiators. It is not known whether this was an acceptable side effect or a mistake, but they display impressive cognitive abilities, though at the cost of a lowered pain threshold.

Those who judge them by their cover only see them as a talking pet. The more attentive ones notice their intelligence, so they can be seen among scientists, programmers, and other intellectuals.
